Wellness.Q: Do you sometimes feel fever, fatigue, shortness or breath, or nausea?
How many times do you usually eat a full meal in a day?
How often do you wakeup throughout the night?
Do you normally feel very angry, sad, or anxious throughout the day?
How many days of the week are you active?

Extracurriculurs.Q: How do you feel about what you're being taught in school?
Extracurriculurs.A: I am excited to learn and confident in class

Extracurriculurs.Q: Do you feel safe during your daily activities?
Do you have friends or classmates that you can spend time with throughout the day?

Oncology.Q: How do you feel about your next doctor's appointment?
How do your at-home medicines make you feel?
Oncology.A: They make me feel happier and more energized

Oncology.Q: How do you feel about your treatments?

Other.Q: On a scale of 1 to 10, how much pain would you say you have on a day-to-day basis?
Is there anything else you want to share with your doctor?
